Package com.panizales

Class Item

java.lang.Object
com.panizales.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
DisplayInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
Course, Curriculum, Topic
public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements DisplayInterface
Item interface is implemented by Classes that deal with objects on an individual level.
Author:
PatrickPanizales

      public abstract void addItem​(java.lang.String name)

    • removeItem

      public abstract void removeItem​(int index)
      Removes an item at a certain index within the Main Item's item list
      Parameters:
      index - index of the item of interest

    • getItem

      public abstract java.lang.Object getItem​(int index)
      Gets an item from the object's list of sub objects from a certain index
      Parameters:
      index - index of the desired item in the list
      Returns:
      object from the item's list of sub objects

    • getSubListSize

      public abstract int getSubListSize()
      Returns:
      size of the list of items under the Main Item

    • statusChecker

      public abstract java.lang.String statusChecker()
      Checks/interprets the status of the item - whether the item has been finished reviewing or not.
      Returns:
      message (string) detailing the status of the item.
